    publications

    Reducing Estimation Bias via Weighted Delayed Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient

    Published in ICTAI’20, Oral, 2020

    We prove that underestimation bias occurs when taking the minimum of a pair of action-value functions.

    Recommended citation: He Q, Hou X. Reducing Estimation Bias via Weighted Delayed Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient[J]. arXiv preprint arXiv:2006.12622, 2020. paper1.pdf

    POPO: Pessimistic Offline Policy Optimization

    Published in NeurIPS’20, WS, 2020

    We show that a challenge arises when applying value-based algorithms to completely offline data that the explosion of the value function. When we evaluate the value function, the error caused by actions out of the distribution will not be eliminated because the inability to interact with the environment makes it impossible to eliminate this error through the Bellman equation.

    Recommended citation: Coming Soon paper2.pdf

    Optimization of Bellman Error Distribution based on SVGD in RL

    Published in Underreview, 2020

    We propose Stein variational gradient descend method that optimizes the Bellman error distribution in the RL algorithm to stabilize the

    Recommended citation: Coming Soon paper4.pdf

    Wide-sense Stationary Policy Optimization with Bellman Residual on Video Games

    Published in ICME’21, Oral, 2020

    We propose Quantile Regression method to optimize to Bellman Residual Distribution to stabilize the training process

    Recommended citation: Coming Soon paper5.pdf
